Name: Holiday Jigsaw Valentine's day
About the game: Love, love, love… It's coming! In Valentine's Day we want to present you: 500 beautiful photos of love. More than 10 hours of gameplay! The unique game mode. Saves, trophies and much more… This game is for you who in love and who are waiting for it. 1. New Holiday Jigsaw is your present for Valentine's Day! 2. More than 10 hours of gameplay. 3. 500 beautiful and cute photos. 4. Truly lovely trophies. 5. 4 unique boxes of puzzles.
